import { useState } from "react" import "./registerStyles.css" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import axios from "axios" export default function Register() { const [username, setUsername] = useState("") const [email, setEmail] = useState("") const [password, setPassword] = useState("") const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() const res = await axios("/auth/register", { username, email, password, }) console.log(res) } return (
Register
setUsername(e.target.value)} /> setEmail(e.target.value)} /> setPassword(e.target.value)} />
) }
